name: Werefrenzy: The ritual
description:
The time has come, each year a bunch of the best wolves are chosen to go to the infamous redhood's house and try to go eat one of their kids.

The inscriptions are open, so eveyone who feels capable to achieve the task can join the trial.

You got challenged by your friends that you are not wolf enough to join the ritual and eat redhood yourself.

When you ask what would they give you if you win the challenge, one of them says "what about a date with my mom?"

they all laugh and few jokes later they are like, ok let's do this.

The wolf sign in the challenge, the deed is set.

Everyone go home now! The fight starts at midnight, so no killing before time!

You go home and wait until midnight for your time to shine....

And so it starts werefrenzy: the ritual

An entry for Reload magazine minigamejam, done within 10 days, using EFPSE engine.

The theme was "Fairytales with a twist, or gory style", so I thought what about the redhood story, but you're another wolf preparing to enter the cabin?

I tried to catch the style of games from the late 80's early 90's, i may have overdone the retro/lofi/8bit/pixelart style, but i'm still sastified with the current result.
